1: <pb/><t>Are utz na</t> <t>ri utzalaj tzijol</t> <t>chuwäch ri utzalaj c'oc'al. <pb/>Are utz na ri k'ij re cämical</t> <t>chuwäch ri k'ij re alanic.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Are utz na ri benam ruc' ri cäminak</t> <t>chuwäch ri benam pa nimak'ij;</t> <t>ri cämical are q'uisbal u c'aslemal</t> <t>ronojel winak,</t> <t>e are' c'ut ri e c'aslic</t> <t>rajawaxic ta ri' u nataxic cumal.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Are utz na ri ok'enic</t> <t>chuwäch ri t,</t> <t>cäraj ne caretzelaj ri palajaj</t> <t>utz c'u cuban na che ri anima'aj.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Ri c'o u no'j</t> <t>cuchomaj rij ri cämical</t> <t>are c'u ri man c'o ta u no'j,</t> <t>are ri u bic che u quicotisaxic rib.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Are utz na qui tatabexic</t> <t>ri qui pixbenic ri ajno'jab</t> <t>che u q'uexwäch ri qui tatabexic</t> <t>ri qui bixonic ri man c'o ta qui no'j.</t>
6: <pb/><t><f>[5]</f>Ri e u tze' ri man c'o ta u no'j</t> <t>quejunamataj cuc' ri qui kuch'uch'ic</t> <t>ri xic'ay q'uix pa ri k'ak',</t> <t>xukuje' wa' man c'o ta u beya'l,</t> <t>xak lok'.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Ri tokinic cuconorisaj ri ajno'j,</t> <t>xukuje' ri banoj u pa k'abaj</t> <t>cuchuwirisaj ri u chomabal.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Are utz na ri u q'uistajic</t> <t>u banic jun jasach</t> <t>chuwäch ri u chaplexic. <pb/>Are utz na ri u cojic ri coch'onic</t> <t>che u q'uexwäch ri cucoj ri chuk'ab.</t>
9: <pb/>Maya' awib chi catumajij ri oyowaric, rumal rech chi ri oyowaric are wa' ri kas c'o ruc' ri winak ri man c'o ta u no'j.
10: <pb/>Mawi jumul chac'oto' ta a chi' jasche ronojel ri k'ijol ri oc'owinak are utz na, jun c'otoj chi'aj c'u wa' ri man cac'oxoman taj.
11: <pb/>Utz xukuje' c'o quechbex che ri no'j cumal ri quejeki' cho we uwächulew ri', we c'u ne achilatal na rumal jun echbal.
12: <pb/>Rumal rech chi ri no'j are jun to'bal ib junam ruc' ri puak, are c'u ri no'j c'o na ri u jalbem rib che u ya'ic u c'aslemal ri ajno'j.
13: <pb/>Kas chatoc il che rilic ri u banom ri Dios: ¿Jachin ta lo ri cäcuin ta che u colomaxic ri u jech'obisam ri are'?
14: <pb/>Aretak c'u utz at benak, chatquicot chupam we utzil ri'; aretak c'u man utz ta catelic chachomaj chi ri jun xukuje' ri jun chic pa u k'ab ri Dios e c'o wi, ri winak mawi jubik' reta'm ri petinak puwi'.
15: <pb/>Ronojel wa' wilom chupam ri man c'o ta u beya'l, xak lok' are' c'u nu c'aslemal wa': utzalaj tak achijab ri quecämic pune' c'o sibalaj cutzil, xukuje' itzel tak winak ri e banal tak etzelal q'ui junab quec'asi'c.
16: <pb/><t>Matux sibalaj at utz,</t> <t>mawi ta sibalaj at ta nawinel.</t> <t>¿Jas ta che xak ta cäretzelaj rib</t> <t>jun pa rech wi?</t>
17: <pb/><t>Matux sibalaj itzel winak,</t> <t>mawi matux sibalaj at con.</t> <t>¿Jas ta che catcäm chanim</t> <t>c'amajok copan ri a k'ijol?</t>
18: <pb/><t>Ri utz na are</t> <t>ri utzalaj u chapic wa'</t> <t>matzokopij c'u bic ri c'o pa k'ab. <pb/>Jachin ri man caresaj taj</t> <t>u q'uixbal ri Dios utz quel na</t> <t>pa conojel we jastak ri'.</t>
19: <pb/><t>C'o na ri chuk'ab ri cuya' ri no'j</t> <t>che ri c'o u no'j</t> <t>che u q'uexwäch ri caquiya'</t> <t>lajuj k'atal tak tzij che jun tinimit.</t>
20: <pb/>Man c'o ta c'u jun cho ri uwächulew ri sibalaj ta tz'akat ri cuban ta amak'el ri utz ri mawi ta jumul ma ta cämacunic.
21: <pb/>Maya' a xiquin che ronojel ri cabixic, je c'u ri' man coc ta pa a xiquin aretak ri pataninel awech catuyok'o.
22: <pb/>Pune' c'u ne aweta'm at xukuje', chi q'ui mul a yok'om chi jule'.
23: <pb/>Ronojel wa' xinnic'oj ruc' no'j, nu cojom c'u pa nu jolom chi quinux ajno'j; man c'u ya'tal ta u rikic wumal.
24: <pb/>¡Man ya'tal ta u rikic wumal ronojel ri c'olic! ¡Sibalaj c'u naj u pam man c'o ta c'u jun cacuin ta che u ch'obic!
25: <pb/>Xinjach c'u wib che u rikic etamanic, che u ch'obic xukuje' quitzucuxic jujun aj no'jalaj tak q'uisbalil. Xincuin c'u che u ch'obic chi man utz ta ri man c'o ta u no'j, jun ch'ujilal c'ut ri cuban rib chi sachinak.
26: <pb/>Nu rikom jun jasach ri c'o na chuwäch ri cämical: ri ixok ri cucoj ri ranima' che qui cojic c'amibal ri caximan ruc' tak ri e u k'ab. Ri utz u binibal chuwäch ri Dios canimaj na chuwäch, are c'u ri cäbin pa ri mac cäkaj na pa tak ri e u c'amibal.
27: <pb/>Chupam ri nu tijow chuk'ab che u rikic jasche quec'ulmataj ri jastak, in ri tzijonel nu rikom wa':
28: <pb/>¡Chi c'ä maja' quinrik ri kas quintzucuj! ¡Nu rikom jun achi chuxo'l jun mil, mawi c'u ne xa ta jun ixok nu rikom ta chquixo'l conojel ri ixokib!
29: <pb/>Xuwi c'u nu rikom ri quinya' u bixic: chi ri Dios tz'akat u banic ri winak xubano, are c'u ri winak u yojim ri u c'aslemal.
